parameter.name: panDegrees
parameter.description: Set the pan value of the camera in degrees. 0 degree is in front of the camera. Values range from -170 to 170.

parameter.name: tiltDegrees
parameter.description: Set the tilt of the camera. Values range from -20 to 90 degrees.

parameter.name: zoom
parameter.description: Set the zoom level of the camera. Values range from 0 to 100.
